programme.title: Tommy Fleetwood: Every shot Abu Dhabi 2023
programme.desc: Every shot from Tommy Fleetwood's four rounds at the DP World Tour season opener, the Abu Dhabi HSBC Championship.

programme.title: Unfiltered @ Abu Dhabi HSBC Championship 2024
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of the 2024 Abu Dhabi HSBC Championship.

programme.title: Australian Open Highlights Show 2024
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner won the 2024 Australian Open in five sets; Shaun Norris claimed Dunhill at 13-under 275.

programme.title: Australian PGA Highlights show 2024
programme.desc: Elvis Smylie won the 2024 Australian PGA Championship at 14-under, 2 strokes ahead of Smith.

programme.title: Alfred Dunhill Championship Highlights Show 2024
programme.desc: Shaun Norris won the 2024 Alfred Dunhill Championship at 13-under 275, claiming his second DP Tour title.

programme.title: Mic'd Up: Johannes Veerman
programme.desc: Johannes Veerman mic'd up for round one of the 2025 Hero Dubai Desert Classic

programme.title: Nedbank Golf Challenge Day 4 2024
programme.desc: Johannes Veerman won the 2024 Nedbank Golf Challenge at 5-under, beating Aldrich Potgieter by one stroke.

programme.title: AfrAsia Mauritius Open Highlights Show 2024
programme.desc: John Parry won the 2024 AfrAsia Mauritius Open with 14-under 274, his 2nd DP Tour win after 14 years.

programme.title: Team Cup Day 3 2025
programme.desc: GB&I led Europe 11-4 on Day 3 of the 2025 Team Cup; standout wins at Abu Dhabi Golf Resort sealed it.

programme.title: Tour Pros Play Mini Golf: Rose vs Horschel
programme.desc: Justin Rose vs. Billy Horschel in a thrilling 8-hole battle!

programme.title: Hero Dubai Desert Classic Day 4 2025
programme.desc: Tyrrell Hatton won the 2025 Dubai Desert Classic at 15-under, his 8th DP Tour title, 5th Rolex win.

programme.title: Hero Dubai Desert Classic Highlights Show 2024
programme.desc: Rory McIlroy won the 2024 Dubai Desert Classic, finishing at 14-under after overcoming a ten-shot deficit.
